entry.title: Technical Blogging with Octopress and MathJax
entry.content:
This is a test post using Octopress and MathJax on github page! I think that this solution is quite satisfactory for technical posts.

For example, we write some math formulae.

\[ \Gamma\vdash_\gamma h_1\models_\gamma h_2 \]

Liquid error: No such file or directory - python -c “import sys; print sys.executable”
